Welcome to the tutorials pags. Within this page you will find various tutorials showing to get more deeper inside "Maven for PHP". If there is something we are missing please ask at Google group for help.
Maven introduces a project lifecycle. Have a look at the tutorials for the most important goals.
Creation (upcomming...)
Create the project using archetypes
Developing (upcomming...)
Develop your project
Testing (upcomming...)
Do unit testing (for details see the unit testing section below)
Building (upcomming...)
Use and customize the maven build goal
Documentation (upcomming...)
Create project documentation (for details see the documentation section below)
Deploy
Deploying the project to repositories and servers.
Managing your organization (upcomming...)
Manage your organization (=maven group id).
Create a open source module (upcomming...)
Create and deploy an open source module.

Closed source modules for your company.

Use the official continuous integration servers.

The tutorial will help you to install 3rd party PHP libraries.

Handling multiple projects and parent poms.
Using eclipse (upcomming...)
Setup and use eclipse for your projects.
Managing dependencies - include path, unpacking and bootstraps
A way to manage the dependency resolution and let maven help you.
